languages.text: "Загоним тварей обратно под землю — тяжелые буровые машины будут имитировать наступление с разных точек, часть проходов завалим, оставим только самые обороноспособные. Поглядим, насколько понравится выродкам чувствовать себя в западне".

"We drive those monstrosities back underground, and use heavy drilling machines to simulate an offensive from multiple directions. Then, we block the majority of the passages, leaving only the best-defended ones open. Let's see how those miscreants enjoy being trapped."
languages.original_text: "Загоним тварей обратно под землю — тяжелые буровые машины будут имитировать наступление с разных точек, часть проходов завалим, оставим только самые обороноспособные. Поглядим, насколько понравится выродкам чувствовать себя в западне".

traits.locale_text: "We drive those monstrosities back underground. Heavy drilling machines simulate an offensive from multiple directions. We block some of the passages, leaving only the best-defended ones. Let's see how those miscreants like being trapped."

"We drive those monstrosities back underground. Heavy drilling machines simulate an offensive from multiple directions. We block some of the passages, leaving only the best-defended ones. Let's see how those miscreants like being trapped."

"We drive those monstrosities back underground, and use heavy drilling machines to simulate an offensive from multiple directions. Then, we block the majority of the passages, leaving only the best-defended ones open. Let's see how those miscreants enjoy being trapped."

"We drive those monstrosities back underground, and use heavy drilling machines to simulate an offensive from multiple directions. Then, we block the majority of the passages, leaving only the best-defended ones open. Let's see how those miscreants enjoy being trapped."

languages.text: "Wir werden diese Monstrositäten zurücktreiben und mit schweren Bohrmaschinen eine Offensive aus verschiedenen Richtungen simulieren. Anschließend blockieren wir einen Großteil der Gänge und lassen nur die am besten verteidigten Stollen offen. Mal sehen, wie es diesen Schurken gefällt, in der Falle zu sitzen."
languages.original_text: "We drive those monstrosities back underground, and use heavy drilling machines to simulate an offensive from multiple directions. Then, we block the majority of the passages, leaving only the best-defended ones open. Let's see how those miscreants enjoy being trapped."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden diese Monstrositäten zurücktreiben und mit schweren Bohrmaschinen eine Offensive aus verschiedenen Richtungen simulieren. Anschließend blockieren wir einen Großteil der Gänge und lassen nur die am besten verteidigten Stollen offen. Mal sehen, wie es diesen Schurken gefällt, in der Falle zu sitzen."

languages.text: "O hilkat garibelerini yerin altına geri süreriz ve birden çok yönden bir saldırıyı simüle etmek için ağır sondaj makineleri kullanırız. Sonra geçitlerin çoğunu kapatıp sadece en iyi savunulanları açık bırakırız. Bakalım alçaklar, kapana kısılmaktan ne kadar hoşlanacak."
languages.original_text: "We drive those monstrosities back underground, and use heavy drilling machines to simulate an offensive from multiple directions. Then, we block the majority of the passages, leaving only the best-defended ones open. Let's see how those miscreants enjoy being trapped."

traits.locale_text: "O hilkat garibelerini yerin altına geri süreriz ve birden çok yönden bir saldırıyı simüle etmek için ağır sondaj makineleri kullanırız. Sonra geçitlerin çoğunu kapatıp sadece en iyi savunulanları açık bırakırız. Bakalım alçaklar, kapana kısılmaktan ne kadar hoşlanacak."

languages.text: «Enviamos a esas monstruosidades de regreso al subsuelo, y utilizamos perforadoras pesadas para simular una ofensiva en múltiples frentes. Luego obstruimos la mayoría de las galerías y dejamos francas únicamente las que estén mejor defendidas. A ver cómo les sienta verse atrapados».
languages.original_text: "We drive those monstrosities back underground, and use heavy drilling machines to simulate an offensive from multiple directions. Then, we block the majority of the passages, leaving only the best-defended ones open. Let's see how those miscreants enjoy being trapped."

traits.locale_text: «Enviamos a esas monstruosidades de regreso al subsuelo, y utilizamos perforadoras pesadas para simular una ofensiva en múltiples frentes. Luego obstruimos la mayoría de las galerías y dejamos francas únicamente las que estén mejor defendidas. A ver cómo les sienta verse atrapados».

languages.text: “我们可以把那些怪物赶回地下，之后使用重型钻探机进行钻探，伪造出从多个方向同时进攻的假象。随后，我们封死绝大部分通道，仅仅留下那些最坚固的通道。到时候，就可以让那些怪物尝尝被逼到绝境的滋味了。”
languages.original_text: "We drive those monstrosities back underground, and use heavy drilling machines to simulate an offensive from multiple directions. Then, we block the majority of the passages, leaving only the best-defended ones open. Let's see how those miscreants enjoy being trapped."

traits.locale_text: “我们可以把那些怪物赶回地下，之后使用重型钻探机进行钻探，伪造出从多个方向同时进攻的假象。随后，我们封死绝大部分通道，仅仅留下那些最坚固的通道。到时候，就可以让那些怪物尝尝被逼到绝境的滋味了。”

languages.text: « Repoussons ces monstruosités dans les profondeurs et utilisons nos outils de forage pour simuler des offensives depuis différentes directions. Bloquons ensuite la majorité des passages de manière à ne laisser ouverts que les mieux défendus. Nous verrons si ces mécréants apprécient d'être piégés. »
languages.original_text: "We drive those monstrosities back underground, and use heavy drilling machines to simulate an offensive from multiple directions. Then, we block the majority of the passages, leaving only the best-defended ones open. Let's see how those miscreants enjoy being trapped."

traits.locale_text: « Repoussons ces monstruosités dans les profondeurs et utilisons nos outils de forage pour simuler des offensives depuis différentes directions. Bloquons ensuite la majorité des passages de manière à ne laisser ouverts que les mieux défendus. Nous verrons si ces mécréants apprécient d'être piégés. »

languages.text: 「化け物どもは地下に押し戻す。大型掘削機で多方面から攻めてるフリをする。で、通路の大半を塞いで、守りが固いところだけ開けておく。閉じ込められてどれだけ愉快か、クズどもに見せてもらおう」
languages.original_text: "We drive those monstrosities back underground, and use heavy drilling machines to simulate an offensive from multiple directions. Then, we block the majority of the passages, leaving only the best-defended ones open. Let's see how those miscreants enjoy being trapped."

traits.locale_text: 「化け物どもは地下に押し戻す。大型掘削機で多方面から攻めてるフリをする。で、通路の大半を塞いで、守りが固いところだけ開けておく。閉じ込められてどれだけ愉快か、クズどもに見せてもらおう。」
